message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and contribute to your success. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I am confident it will be worth every penny to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $13500. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my return on investment and ensuring you receive a fair deal. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to collaborate.
